COVID-19 Live Report Enayetur Raheem, Ph.D. 2020-03-29 About this report This is a live report about the COVID-19 pandemic also known as SARS-CoV2. Disclaimer The information provided here are for education purposes only. All data have been collected from freely available resources. For complete referecnes, please check the Reference section of this report. This live report is updated a few times daily. So please check back to get the most up to date report. Purpose The goal of this report is to provide up to date summary of the global situation and compare that with Bangladesh. Data sources 2019 Novel Coronavirus COVID-19 (2019-nCoV) Data Repository by Johns Hopkins CSSE https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19 নিউ ইয়র্ক টাইমস গিটহাব রিপজিটরি https://github.com/nytimes/covid-19-data Volunteering opportunity If you have experience with R programming, and have interest in controbuting to this project, please reach out to me vial email: enayetur.raheem@brfbd.org. Please mention specifically how you want to contribute. Because I receive too many inquiries, I cannot reply to each an every email. I will only respond if your email has sufficient information to spark my interest. Thanks in advance :) What skills are useful writing R functions to perform a specific task given a data set fitting statistical models timeseries forecasting Found and error? If you have found an error, please create an issue at https://github.com/raheems/covid19/issues
